ing: 1 (8 ounce) can pineapple chunks in juice
2 apples, cored and cut into wedges
des: "A light, fruity white wine sangria perfect for a hot summer day! Serve over ice."
ins: Mix Riesling, apple juice, and peach schnapps together in a large pitcher. Stir in pineapple chunks and their juice, orange sections, and apple wedges. Refrigerate until flavors blend, 1 hour to overnight. Add ginger ale just before serving.
